ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:45:57 [Issue ID 4000-412728] urn:comicvine:4000-412728 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 22:15:36. [Issue ID 2521464]
ComicInfo.Summary:
"Shadowhawk III" written, penciled and inked by Jim Valentino, figure inks by Chance Wolf, background inks by Brad W. Foster and edited by Len Senecal. "The Pact" co-written and layouts by Jim Valentino, co-written and edited by Len Senecal, penciled by Walter McDaniels, inked by Matt Banning and lettered by Mike Wolf. "J.P. Slaughter" co-plotted by Jim Valentino, written, penciled and inked by Chris Wozniak, lettered by Mike Wolf and edited by Len Senecal. "The Others" written and layouts by Jim Valentino, penciled by Scott Kolins, inked by Jon Holdredge, lettered by Mike Wolf and edited by Len Senecal. Notes:
An all black and white issue. No ads.
